statement.p: From the observation deck of the lighthouse at Sasquatch Point 54 feet above the surface of Lake Ippizuti, a lifeguard spots a boat out on the lake sailing directly toward the light house. The first sighting had a angle of depression of 7.9ยบ and the second sighting had an angle of depression of 25.6ยบ. How far had the boat traveled between the sightings?
